overview.subtitle: Everything you need to run and scale your online business

fullFeatures.subtitle: Built with advanced technology to help you make better business decisions

items.title: AI Business Intelligence
items.desc: Ask questions in natural language and get instant charts, insights, and analytics about your business performance, sales trends, and profitability.

items.title: Complete Order Lifecycle Management
items.desc: Fetch orders from WooCommerce, assign team members, track from placement to delivery with automated workflows and status updates.

items.title: Team Management & Performance
items.desc: Assign orders to team members, track individual performance metrics, conversion rates, and productivity with detailed analytics.

items.title: Advanced Reporting & Profit Analysis
items.desc: Generate comprehensive reports on sales, profit/loss, inventory turnover, and business performance with exportable data.

items.title: Smart Inventory & Stock Management
items.desc: Real-time stock tracking, low inventory alerts, automatic reorder suggestions, and inventory optimization recommendations.

items.title: Bulk Delivery Partner Operations
items.desc: Assign multiple orders to delivery partners in bulk, track shipments, and manage courier partnerships with Pathao, RedX, SA Paribahan.

items.title: Customer Order History & CRM
items.desc: Complete customer profiles with order history, purchase patterns, and personalized insights for better customer relationship management.

items.title: Automated Invoicing & Documentation
items.desc: Bulk invoice generation, delivery slip printing, memo creation, and automated documentation for seamless order processing.

items.title: Fraud Detection & Security
items.desc: Duplicate order detection, fraud prevention, and security measures to protect your business from fake orders.
